name: tower_2016
review: Uniquely done movie and well told.

name: tower_2016
review: Solid documentary. The stories told and the art styles used were executed soundly. Tragic events of history should be documented using Tower as its inspiration as it only glances at the life of the murderer and puts the attention on the victims and 'heros.' This is a must watch documentary.

name: tower_2016
review: One of the best documentaries I've ever seen. An event filled with stories of bravery, love, and admitted cowardice. This film beautifully recounts terrible events that unfolded over 50 years ago.

name: tower_2016
review: It's amazing how much human emotion animated characters based on actual people can convey.

name: tower_2016
review: Mixing unique animation with interviews of the victims, and footage of the event, Tower is one of the best, and most unique documentaries I've ever seen. It's a film that shows the very worst of human behavior, but also the best of it as well.

name: tower_2016
review: Really different with part animation, part actors and part real people from the happening that day. Very moving.

name: tower_2016
review: One of the BEST documentaries I've seen in ages. I still can't get it out of my head.

name: tower_2016
review: Powerful documentary. With the rotoscoping animation along with the interviews of those who fully encountered the event, as well as actual footage of the event; it all blends together in a powerful way. Masterfully edited. Highly recommend this powerful film!

name: tower_2016
review: A great way to make a movie about a tragic event. I loved the animation style and the mixture of actual footage/photography with the animation. Great storytelling style. Emotionally powerful and just great.

name: tower_2016
review: Amazing documentary. Very unique. The colors and art style used was so beautiful. The story was done justice and it had a great cultural theme behind it.

name: tower_2016

name: tower_2016

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: The other Satoshi Kon masterpiece. In my opinion, this is his most inventive and unique work which is saying something. Here he uses his ability to tell surreal, logic-bending stories for a completely new purpose than you'd expect. It's near perfect.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: While Tokyo Godfathers might be my favorite Satoshi Kon movie, Millennium Actress is, to my mind, his best film

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: Thought provoking and tragic in all the right ways

name: millennium_actress_2001

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: The best thing ever.

review: The reason why I believe anime can be art.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: Honestly, the ending made me cry. Secondly, I think this movie is beautiful, I strongly believe this is the best Satoshi Kon film. This film has such a great story and such great animation. This is one of the best anime films of the century! This film is also one of the best films I have ever seen.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: Are you ready for a never fulfilled love story that goes through a lifetime and beyond ?

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: Like Paprika (2006), Kon introduces us to a protagonist whom we follow with unfailing loyalty. 'Millennium Actress' is storytelling at its best - a study of disjointed, half-remembered memories that confront some of the more difficult epochs of Japanese history.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: My favourite of Satoshi Kon's work! moving between past and present and fiction and fantasy as only animation can do

name: millennium_actress_2001

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: This is a brilliant movie.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: "Millennium Actress" é um anime excelente, tanto pela parte técnica e a direção, como pela história. O enredo é todo não-linear e passa por várias eras do Japão Feudal; as guerras; o pós-guerra e mistura até cenários de ficção científica em viagens interestelares.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: This flawless work of art excels in its music and stunning anime, but most of all it is remembered for its deep plot. Granted, you might have to see it more than once to truly "get" the plot along with several aspects of the movie, it is a must-see for anime fans and newcomers alike.

name: millennium_actress_2001
review: One of the finest anime ever made. Studio Ghibli for adults.

name: waltz_with_bashir

name: when_marnie_was_there

review: Stunning animation filled to the brim with peaceful moments (as always with Ghibli's films) and emotional clarity the likes of which no other animation house can achieve. A bittersweet mystery and a heart-turning wollop at the end.

name: when_marnie_was_there

review: My #1 favorite movie of 2016. Kubo is everything I could want in a movie. I have no flaws with this movie. It's beautifully animated, voice acted, and such a cool story. I really wish people would support this more than they did. Laika studios has put out their best film here.

name: kubo_and_the_two_strings_2016
review: I have no idea why people pretend to enjoy "Kubo and the Two Strings" so much. This is possibly the worst movie I have seen in my entire life. The movie doesn't make sense- nothing is explained properly, and the characters are annoying. Also, there are three strings, not two.

I had to walk out.

It's a pure emotional high, and you don't come down once the experience is over; you take it with you. And it's just so beautiful to look at.

This film touches on very sensitive subjects such as homelessness, homosexuality, and unwanted children. Amazing and tragic as well as funny. One of the best anime of all time.

name: tokyo_godfathers
review: being a class a1 grinch i avoided this movie like the plague. i gave it a go on the basis of satoshi kon's other ripper 'memories'. 'tokyo godfathers' proves without doubt kon's masterful storytelling and sublime compositional talents. if you like this, 'paranoia agent' will blow you away.

name: tokyo_godfathers

name: tokyo_godfathers
review: This is a near perfect film. Seriously. It's funny, touching, creates powerful and compelling characters. It's excellently voice acted and completely perfectly written. I am very hard on film writers, being a theatre writer, and this is writing perfection.

name: persepolis
review: With audacious black-and-white animation, Persepolis is an emotionally strong and fascinating historical treasure.

name: persepolis
review: Persepolis gracefully walks on the border between Cameron Crowe-like honesty and subtle Alexander Payne-like drama. Only, the thing is, it's so much more than that. Its characters are strangely endearing, its animation is sparse and powerful, and its story is beautiful.

name: persepolis
review: A powerful film, that not only share the same beautiful visual style as the comic that inspired it, but also includes a memorable plot, and well rounded characters. An animation classic.

name: persepolis
review: A feature film cartoon that is not a 3D in 2007 nor an anime, it's a very rare occurrence. And when it is so beautifully drawn and voiced in a simple style yet so lively can be almost unique. It is one of my all time favorite top 10 movies.

name: persepolis
review: A beautifully narrated real-life fairytale. Marjane Satrapi achieves perfection with this incredible animated feature, presenting Tehran as a modern western city, making the audiences realise that a political revolt, is not determined by geographical positions on a map.

name: persepolis
review: Exceptionally playful but sticks to being honest. It makes you feel every gritty and crazy detail of Satrapi's autobiography, the accounts of her history, of her people's history. Her genius wit is strategically planted all over and under the political-cultural war context of this touching material.

name: persepolis
review: This movie is dark, insightful, charming, and powerful. Completely captivating, and unforgettable. One of those movies that will make you laugh and cry, laid out in a striking format.
